name: Pix'n Love Rush - GameClub
description:
“Comes together beautifully to create a game that’s perfectly suited for long or short play sessions. It’s the game that really needs to be on your device!”

– TouchArcade 9/10

“It just may be your next iPhone addiction. It certainly is mine. A retrogaming love letter!”

– IGN Editor Choice 8,9/10


“Pix’n Love – Rush is a surprisingly epic, retro-styled gem.”

– SlideToPlay 4/4

“A superb platforming game, it’s tense, fast and fun.”

– appaddict.com 5/5

“A great addition to the platformer genre with a fantastic retro style.”

– 148apps.com 5/5

“A great arcade game to play”

– Gamezebo 5/5

“A festival of fun”

– PocketGamer 7/10

“A passionate tribute to retrogaming and old consoles of our childhood.”

-Dutch Game Awards: Best Euro Mobile Game


“The solid platforming is enhanced with wonderfully original visuals and a great soundtrack.”

– Destructoid.com

“A challenging and addictive title that’s almost endlessly appealing.”

– appspy.com 5/5

“It’s definitely a must-have for any device, and will leave an 8-bit smile on your face.”

– Touchgen 9/10

“A pure game of scoring – still one of the best past-times ever invented.”

– Gameblog.fr 8/10

“A short, budget shot of old-school gaming.”

– Edge Magazine 7/10
**************************************************

Pix'n Love Rush is playable for free, with some sections and features available only to subscribers of GameClub Pro, an optional auto-renewing monthly subscription which also removes ads. Besides the GameClub Pro subscription, there are no other in-app purchases in this game.
If you choose to purchase the optional subscription:
- Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. No charge will be made for the free trial period.
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior of the current period, at the cost indicated.
- You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal by going to your App Store account settings after purchase.
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable
- Terms of use: https://gameclub.io/terms
- Privacy Policy: https://gameclub.io/privacy
